name: YouTube Old Colors
description: Changes all the bright red colors on YouTube to the darker red that was previously used. The new color is the same as how is used to be and is easier on the eyes than the super-bright color they now use. It also replaces the new YouTube logo with the old one.
additional_info:
I am a bit of an amateur  at this, so there's times when it might break depending on certain things. PM me if you have any fixes or issues.

Changelog:

V2 - Changed the logo so that it won't mess up the placement of the country letters next to it.

discussions.name: Logo implementation could be improved. See my full post for more details.
